name: agent-loop-runner
description: Orchestrates PlaywrightPlanning agent runs per URL with fresh chat sessions and progress-file status watching.

agentLoopRunner.maxLoopsPerUrl.description: Outer max loops per URL. Passed into prompt header as MaxLoopsPerUrl.

agentLoopRunner.featureMapWindowMs.description: Window to map newly created progress files to the most recent unmapped running job.

agentLoopRunner.promptTemplatePath.description: Path (workspace-relative) to the prompt template to use. The extension will inject URL and headers.

agentLoopRunner.agentName.description: Name of the chat agent to address each prompt to (e.g. PlaywrightPlanning). Must match a .github/agents/<name>.agent.md file.

agentLoopRunner.perJobTimeoutMs.description: Maximum milliseconds to wait for a single job's agent to write a status file. 0 = no timeout (default). Recommended: 1800000 (30 min) as a safety net for unattended runs.

agentLoopRunner.progressGlob.description: Glob pattern for progress-tracking files. Used to map agent-created progress files to running jobs.

agentLoopRunner.specGlob.description: Glob pattern for spec files generated by the agent.

agentLoopRunner.requirementsGlob.description: Glob pattern for requirements files generated by the agent.
